SEARCH
Package com.walletapp.servlets

Class RecordServlet

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.GenericServlet
javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
com.walletapp.servlets.RecordServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
@WebServlet("/RecordServlet") public class RecordServlet extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
The RecordServlet class is responsible for retrieving and displaying user-specific financial records within the WalletApp application.

It interacts with multiple DAO classes (RecordDAO, AccountDAO, LabelDAO) to fetch data from the database such as user records, accounts, and labels. The data is then forwarded to the records.jsp page for rendering.

URL Mapping: /RecordServlet

Workflow:

  • Validates user session and ensures the user is logged in.
  • Fetches all records, accounts, and labels for the logged-in user.
  • Sets the retrieved data as request attributes.
  • Forwards the request to the JSP page for display.
Since:
2025-10-07
Version:

Author:
Sayan
